title: Wave pulses - 6 mm and 2 mm pulses overlap

content.question: Two wave pulses with the amplitudes indicated in the figure are moving toward each other on a string, each with the same speed. What is the magnitude of the displacement of the string at point <math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></math>, which is midway between the two pulses, at the instant that the pulses completely overlap?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
